Package com.paypal.svcs.types.ap

Class Summary
Address Java class for Address complex type.
AddressList Java class for AddressList complex type.
CancelPreapprovalRequest The request to cancel a Preapproval.
CancelPreapprovalResponse The result of the CancelPreapprovalRequest.
ConfirmPreapprovalRequest The request to confirm a Preapproval.
ConfirmPreapprovalResponse The result of the ConfirmPreapprovalRequest.
ConvertCurrencyRequest A request to convert one or more currencies into their estimated values in other currencies.
ConvertCurrencyResponse A response that contains a table of estimated converted currencies based on the Convert Currency Request.
CurrencyCodeList A list of ISO currency codes.
CurrencyConversion Describes the conversion between 2 currencies.
CurrencyConversionList A list of estimated currency conversions for a base currency.
CurrencyConversionTable A table that contains a list of estimated currency conversions for a base currency in each row.
CurrencyList A list of ISO currencies.
DisplayOptions Customizable options that a client application can specify for display purposes.
ErrorList Java class for ErrorList complex type.
ExecutePaymentRequest The request to execute the payment request.
ExecutePaymentResponse The result of a payment execution.
FundingConstraint Java class for FundingConstraint complex type.
FundingPlan FundingPlan describes the funding sources to be used for a specific payment.
FundingPlanCharge Amount to be charged to a particular funding source.
FundingSource Funding source information.
FundingTypeInfo FundingTypeInfo represents one allowed funding type.
FundingTypeList Java class for FundingTypeList complex type.
GetAllowedFundingSourcesRequest The request to get the allowed funding sources available for a preapproval.
GetAllowedFundingSourcesResponse The response to get the backup funding sources available for a preapproval.
GetAvailableShippingAddressesRequest The request to get the addresses available for a payment.
GetAvailableShippingAddressesResponse The response to get the shipping addresses available for a payment.
GetFundingPlansRequest The request to get the funding plans available for a payment.
GetFundingPlansResponse The response to get the funding plans available for a payment.
GetPaymentOptionsRequest The request to get the options of a payment request.
GetPaymentOptionsResponse The response message for the GetPaymentOption request Java class for GetPaymentOptionsResponse complex type.
GetShippingAddressesRequest The request to get the addresses available for a payment.
GetShippingAddressesResponse The response to get the shipping addresses available for a payment.
InitiatingEntity Details about the party that initiated this payment.
InstitutionCustomer The customer of the initiating institution Java class for InstitutionCustomer complex type.
InvoiceData Describes a payment for a particular receiver (merchant), contains list of additional per item details.
InvoiceItem Describes an individual item for an invoice.
ObjectFactory This object contains factory methods for each Java content interface and Java element interface generated in the com.paypal.svcs.types.ap package.
PayError The error that resulted from an attempt to make a payment to a receiver.
PayErrorList Java class for PayErrorList complex type.
PaymentDetailsRequest The request to look up the details of a PayRequest.
PaymentDetailsResponse The details of the PayRequest as specified in the Pay operation.
PaymentInfo PaymentInfo represents the payment attempt made to a Receiver of a PayRequest.
PaymentInfoList Java class for PaymentInfoList complex type.
PayRequest The PayRequest contains the payment instructions to make from sender to receivers.
PayResponse The PayResponse contains the result of the Pay operation.
PreapprovalDetailsRequest The request to look up the details of a Preapproval.
PreapprovalDetailsResponse The details of the Preapproval as specified in the Preapproval operation.
PreapprovalRequest A request to create a Preapproval.
PreapprovalResponse The result of the PreapprovalRequest is a preapprovalKey.
Receiver Receiver is the party where funds are transferred to.
ReceiverIdentifier The sender identifier type contains information to identify a PayPal account.
ReceiverList Java class for ReceiverList complex type.
ReceiverOptions Options that apply to the receiver of a payment, allows setting additional details for payment using invoice.
RefundInfo RefundInfo represents the refund attempt made to a Receiver of a PayRequest.
RefundInfoList Java class for RefundInfoList complex type.
RefundRequest A request to make a refund based on various criteria.
RefundResponse The result of a Refund request.
SenderIdentifier The sender identifier type contains information to identify a PayPal account.
SenderOptions Options that apply to the sender of a payment.
SetPaymentOptionsRequest The request to set the options of a payment request.
SetPaymentOptionsResponse The response message for the SetPaymentOption request Java class for SetPaymentOptionsResponse complex type.
